price: Jepu lajmin e mirë besimtarëve se Allahu ka (përgatitur) për ata dhunti të madhe!
arabic: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضۡلٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wabashiri al-mu'minīna bi-anna lahum mina al-lahi faḍlan kabīran
